Interface R2LightSingleType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    R2LightReadableType, R2LightSingleReadableType, R2LightSingleWritableType, R2LightWritableType
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    R2LightProjectiveType, R2LightProjectiveUsableType, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowReadableType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceType, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowWritableType, R2LightScreenSingleType, R2LightSphericalSingleType, R2LightVolumeSingleType, R2LightWithShadowSingleType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2LightAmbientScreenSingle, R2LightDirectionalScreenSingle, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadow, R2LightProjectiveWithShadowVariance, R2LightSphericalSingle

    public interface R2LightSingleType
extends R2LightSingleReadableType, R2LightSingleWritableType
    The type of single-instance lights.
